title: @Riot. FPS/Audio. Day 13.
body:
Maybe constantly spamming everyday about this will bring it to your attention?

Audio distortion and FPS drop in mac client. When will this be fixed? I've gone through all of the posts about this and the last comment was by an employee in skins team who said he *thinks* you guys are investigating it which was already almost a week ago. Very kind of him to at least give an answer while everyone in Riot in charge of this problem is remaining silent.

Any updates or are you guys just gonna ignore this until the next patch? If so, then tell us so I can stop wasting my time on this board checking for updates everyday and just return to play next patch.

If you guys are just gonna let this problem continue even past 6.7, can you guys also just tell me? I don't want to waste my time clinging on to the hope that you guys would fix it someday or at least give an update about this problem in the boards.

I love this game but it's been getting pretty annoying checking for 13 days that you guys would somehow respond to this. I guess you guys probably don't care one player leaving the game or bunch of mac players for that matter as long as there are greater number of windows players. I'm not sure if that's the best way to conduct a business but who am I to say considering your success in the industry so far.

Anyways hope someone from Riot at least leaves a comment about it here. Thanks.


*Unfortunately, the problem still continues in patch 6.7.

replies.body:
If this was a PC problem it would have been addressed much much earlier.
I have been playing w it sound disabled for close to two weeks now which makes gameplay both unenjoyable and unfair.

Sorry if the communication hasn't quite been there on this. We're still working on it, but unfortunately the dev team still hasn't been able to find a root cause.  From the latest updates this morning, there's a few possible leads they're following up on, but nothing concrete.

I've been trying to respond to these threads as I see them, but I'll see what I can do to smooth out the communication flow on this issue.  Appreciate the feedback!

Thanks for the update. I was just skeptical and annoyed because there were no specific announcements made about this issue despite how critical the problem is for many mac users. It just appeared odd to me how you guys are so quick to announce certain issues on both the website and the client (such as match history and server transfer) while this one seemed to remain relatively silent. I guess you guys only announce it after the root cause is found? Either way, thanks for the update. It's good to know that this problem is still being actively investigated.

I hear you.  So, for a bit of context, we generally reserve status announcements for widespread or heavily impacting issues. For example, the two issues you mentioned (match history and server transfers failing) could potentially affect 100% of players.  From what we've seen so far, this particular FPS issue with Macs isn't even widespread among Mac users.  I believe the latest data I've seen estimates ~11% of Mac players could be affected.

This can make both diagnosing the problem as well as communication a bit tricky.  How much value is there to put a server status message for the issue when 90% of the people who it's meant for wouldn't even experience the issue?  Could we be confusing players who may be experiencing FPS issues for other reasons?  Not always a clear answer to these types of questions.  Hope this helps give a bit of insight (from my perspective at least)
2 weeks past! new patch 6.7 and we still can't play. were are only 11% so just let it go. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Don't forget about us...

Im curious where the 11%~ of mac players are only experiencing this issue, because it seems like since 6.6 the board has been absolutely flooded with posts from a majority of mac users. If you really want I can post every single one, a majority of them without a response from any Red member.

Also whats stopping you guys from reverting the "sound" portion of the 6.6 patch to the 6.5 patch to fix the problem when it has been stated multiple times that its an "audio bug"

People only post when there's a problem.  Say the boards had 1000 pings of unique traffic each day.  Having 100 people post about it is still 10%-.  Then take into account that the boards are a fraction of a fraction of a percent of the overall community.  

Riot might've not replied to everyone, but they're here now.

I see. Thanks, that clarifies things for me. I wasn't even sure how many mac players were affected by this. However, for me at least, I tried reinstalling the client, repairing, changing graphics settings, adjusting sounds, and followed the FPS guideline you guys posted and everything but nothing worked. I've never experienced this problem and from the posts I have read on this board, I have low doubts the problem lies to 11% of the Mac players/their laptops as they all shared similar stories as mine. So I would appreciate it if you guys could continue to investigate the issue on that end. Anyways thanks for the response/explanation!

Glad I could help clear things up :D

If you haven't already, I'd also suggest [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  They will likely tell you the same steps as before, but it can help us track the issue and give us a place to collect logs if we need it.

One thing you should figure out is how many people are actually being affected by this because a lot of them might be thinking something is wrong with their laptop and not the game since it's such a weird bug that makes it seem like lag or a laptop problem. Post on your riot facebook/twitter and ask and I think maybe more people will come out and say they are experiencing this problem.

> [{quoted}](name=nick costco,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=p5rIeFmy,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-04-06T19:59:39.309+0000)
>
> One thing you should figure out is how many people are actually being affected by this because a lot of them might be thinking something is wrong with their laptop and not the game since it's such a weird bug that makes it seem like lag or a laptop problem. Post on your riot facebook/twitter and ask and I think maybe more people will come out and say they are experiencing this problem.

rito support wants us to think that we got a problem with laptops, because like they say only 11% have this problem

I put in a ticket the first time (13 says ago) but I gave up around the 4th time they messaged me back because each and every time they said it was problem with my laptop, it made not even want to play anymore. I even told them it was an Audio bug that came with Patch 6.6 and they still continued on with telling to reset or update specific things on my laptop which I did do but led to nowhere because I would still have the same problem at the end. It just felt pointless to keep going. I want to get the problem fixed. Were 11% but were still a part of your community Riot. You see us on your boards everyday trying to get this fixed so we can actually play your game and for the most part until today we barely had any replies or updates on what was going on. You could've at least mentioned in the status bar in game, "We are aware of the Audio Issues for a percentage of mac users and are working on a fix." That would've been more than enough for us to sit tight and wait for you guys to figure something out.

-Macbook Pro 2011 Model
Any updates?

I thought there was something wrong with my mac for a while now and It even made me think I couldn't play league of legends anymore because when there's a big team fight in game the sound is all messed up and I lag. Now I stumble on this thread and find out it's been a bug this whole time???? This has been happening to me since the patch!!! Please fix this! I hope the new patch doesn't have this. I play league so weird right now where I try to avoid big team fights!

I've read that muting the audio prevents it.. idk though.
Its better to play mute than having -7 FPS..

I've had this problem way before 6.6

Yes, muted audio eliminates the problem for me. What also usually works is to change the music theme in the SR sounds menu to "classic" (no luck for ARAM, always bugged there).

I wonder what would happen in a game with DJ Sona?

So difficult to play without any sound! Rito pls.
